QuestData.Title: Gonk, Lord of the Pack
QuestData.Description: You can find Gonk in his lair west of here, in de Garden of the Loa.$b$bYou should be able to see his totems. Run near dem to improve your speed.$b$bI will continue to purge de heretics from dis temple.$b$bMind your manners around de loa, or he may rip your throat out.
